item.title: Visualizing stock market charts with rCharts in R
item.description: I came across rCharts package developed by Ramnath Vaidyanathan early this year and quickly become a big fan of it. rCharts is a R interface to multiple javascript charting libraries, allowing one to quickly generate a interactive visualization in R environments. Currently the official rCharts supports may popular javascript charting...

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to the first post of the dingh blog. The purpose of starting this blog is to document and share some of my projects.
